main.name: Software Engineer
main.description: with actual expirience in system administration, automation and software development. My passion for technology keeps me taking new challenges on the way to becoming a decent engineer
main.bio: An average self-taught software engineer, who transitioned from Finance to IT.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.school: Peoples' Friendship University of Russia - RUDN University
education.description: In overall, during my study I got some theoretical knowledge of economics and applied mathematics. On a practical side I got some experience with Python programming language, using it for data analysis.

work.title: Java automation engineer
work.description: Sberbank-Technology is founded in 2011 as a subsidiary of Sberbank (leading Russian bank). The primary company objective is to maintain the Sberbank IT systems. This opportunity allowed me to use my knoledge in Finance and Java programming skills to maintain and improve critical national infrastructure.

work.title: Java / Python automation engineer
work.description: Leading Russian developer and supplier of authentication devices, products and solutions for information security and confidential data protection. My goal there was developing internal tools and writing automated tools for company products.

work.title: Python DevOps
work.description: Small outsource company which provide wide variety of services for their customers (from administrating of servers to building complete solutions from scratch). Here I improved my existing knowledge and acquired new experience with Windows servers, Powershell and using OOP in Python.

work.title: Linux system administrator
work.description: Russian ISP. It's main product was maintanance of network access from city to city trains. Here I started my career as a system administrator. Got some experience with computer networks, Linux and automating using Bash.
